landing.title: Memory Match Mobile
landing.subtitle: Wasan Kimantawa na Hankali
landing.description1: Memory Match Mobile wasa ne mai sauÆ™i na tunani na hankali wanda ke gwada tunani na ji da tunawa. Aikace-aikacen yana kunna jerin sautuka uku daban-daban, sannan ya Æ™alubalanci masu amfani don gano sautunan da suka ji bayan É—an jinkiri.
landing.description2: An tsara shi azaman aikace-aikace mai sauÆ™i wanda ke aiki da inganci ko da a yankunan karkara masu Æ™arancin haÉ—in intanet, aikace-aikacen yana gudana gaba É—aya a cikin burauzar ku tare da Æ™arancin amfani da bayanai. Ana adana duk bayanan aiki a cikin na'urarku don cikakken sirri, yana sa ya zama mai sauÆ™in shiga ga al'ummomi a duk duniya ba tare da la'akari da Æ™untatawa na ababen more rayuwa ba.
landing.feature1Desc: Yi motsa jiki da ikon ganowa da adana bayani na É—an lokaci.
landing.feature2Desc: Yi amfani da sautunan duniyar gaske don Æ™arfafa Æ™warewar kulawa da sauti.
landing.feature3Desc: Kowane zama, adadin sautuka yana Æ™aruwa - har inda za ku iya zuwa?
landing.disclaimer: Ku tuna, a matsayin ma'aikacin waya, ba ku ne abokin ciniki ba! Aikin ku shine ku lura da sautuka, ba amsa waya ba ğŸ“±
